quote: Unexpressed emotions will never die. They are buried alive and will come forth later in uglier ways. – Sigmund Freud
fact: The common idea that only 10% of the brain is used it not true as it is impossible to determine the actual percentage because of the complexity of the brain.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What do you call a bear with no teeth? A gummy bear!
